serviceDescription:
The Remote Sensing Division is dedicated to empowering our clientele through the
implementation of cutting-edge remote sensing solutions. We specialize in providing
high-accuracy workflows tailored for construction inspection, surveying, aerial mapping, mining, and public safety applications.
Our services span through a wide range of applications that serve several sectors.

articles.title: Photogrammetry
articles.description: We design and manufacture UAV systems for a variety of applications, including aerial mapping, surveying, and public safety. Our systems are tailored to meet the specific needs of our clients.

chooseUs.title: Why Choose MARS Robotics
description: Innovation: We are constantly pushing the boundaries of robotic technology.
Focus on You: our solutions are customer-centric, tailored to meet your needs and challenges.
ITAR-Free Advantage: Our solutions are not subject to ITAR restrictions, making them accessible to a wider audience.
Reliable Partner: We are committed to providing you with the support and expertise you need to succeed.
